channel.title: Music – 오픈(oftn)
channel.description: Recent content in 오픈(oftn) on Music

item.title: 오픈(oftn) - there for you
item.description:
you take the air out the room
I watch you run while I barely move
I’m stuck playing second to you
know that I’m not ashamed
to cover my face
the words that I say
get buried I’m used to it
no I’m not ashamed
to call out your name
so you know I’m right there for you
I worry my dear
I can’t help but feel that
you’ll be with her while I’m waiting right here
he says worry won’t get me nowhere
know that I’m not ashamed
to cover my face
the words that I say
get buried I’m used to it
no I’m not ashamed
to call out your name
so you know I’m right there for you
all my dreams
I concede
compared to yours
aren’t anything
all my dreams
fade too black
over and over
know that I’m not ashamed
to cover my face
the words that I say
get buried I’m used to it
no I’m not ashamed
to call out your name
so you know I’m right there for you
you take the air out the room
I watch you run while I barely move
I’m stuck playing second to you
